mapper.insert:
insert all
into bithumb (bithumb_pk, currency, opening_price, closing_price, min_price, max_price, average_price, units_traded, volume_1day, volume_7day, buy_price, sell_price, fluctate_24H, fluctate_rate_24H) values (#{item.bithumb_pk}, #{item.currency}, #{item.opening_price}, #{item.closing_price}, #{item.min_price}, #{item.max_price}, #{item.average_price}, #{item.units_traded}, #{item.volume_1day}, #{item.volume_7day}, #{item.buy_price}, #{item.sell_price}, #{item.fluctate_24H}, #{item.fluctate_rate_24H})
select * from dual

insert all
into upbit (upbit_pk, market, opening_price, high_price, low_price, trade_price, prev_closing_price, change, change_price, change_rate, signed_change_price, signed_change_rate, trade_volume, acc_trade_price, acc_trade_price_24h, acc_trade_volume, acc_trade_volume_24h) values (#{item.upbit_pk}, #{item.market}, #{item.opening_price}, #{item.high_price}, #{item.low_price}, #{item.trade_price}, #{item.prev_closing_price}, #{item.change}, #{item.change_price}, #{item.change_rate}, #{item.signed_change_price}, #{item.signed_change_rate}, #{item.trade_volume}, #{item.acc_trade_price}, #{item.acc_trade_price_24h}, #{item.acc_trade_volume}, #{item.acc_trade_volume_24h})
select * from dual
